channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Devastating’: Footage shows what went wrong in Washington plane crash that left no survivors
Everyone aboard an American Airlines jet that collided with an Army helicopter is feared dead

item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Day 2 of RFK Jr. confirmation hearings kick off in Senate
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is back on Capitol Hill for a hearing before the Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions committee.

item.title: Netanyahu Criticizes 'Shocking' Hostage Scenes, Delays Release of Palestinian Prisoners
Is a fully paid-off home in retirement really worth it? Not for all US retirees — here’s why
State of emergency declared in Dover due to potential cybersecurity threat
'Shower of sparks': Witness describes midair collision over Potomac River
item.description: While driving home, Ari Shulman said a "spray of sparks" in the sky caught his attention as he watched in horror the midair collision unfold.

item.title: Kash Patel, Trump's controversial pick for FBI director, set to face Senate grilling

item.title: Trump speaks about D.C. plane crash, points blame at DEI
item.description: President Trump delivered remarks Thursday morning in the aftermath of the first major commercial plane crash in the U.S. in more than a decade.

item.title: 2 teens from a Boston skating club, their mothers, and coaches among passengers on downed flight

item.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second administration with a series of controversial moves and decisions.

item.title: Watch Live: Kash Patel confirmation hearing for FBI director
item.description: President Trump has nominated Kash Patel to serve as FBI director. He is appearing before the Senate Judiciary Committee for his confirmation hearing.

item.title: Democratic party needs to focus on taking on Trump, being less "rigid," DNC chief says

item.title: Watch Live: Tulsi Gabbard confirmation hearing for director of national intelligence

item.title: Who is Sean Duffy, the public face of the federal government’s response to the DC plane crash?
item.description: Sean Duffy, the new transportation secretary, was facing his first major crisis just hours after being sworn in for the job.

item.title: DC plane crash live updates: Trump blames diversity, 'confluence of bad decisions'

item.title: Vance suggests some reporters covering the Trump White House are biased
